  • Method Details

    • validateRatingValue

      public Rating validateRatingValue​(Rating rating)
      Limits the given Points of a given Rating to the defined minimum and maximum
      Parameters:
      rating - the rating object that should be corrected
      Returns:
      the rating object with a "givenPoints" value between the minimum and the maximum of points that can be given

    • addReferencesToRating

      public Rating addReferencesToRating​(Rating rating) throws InvalidRatingException
      Ads references to the responding medium and to the user to the rating object
      Parameters:
      rating - the rating object that should be given references
      Returns:
      the rating object with valid references to medium and user
      Throws:
      InvalidRatingException - if mediumId or userId are invalid

    • convertToDto

      public RatingDto convertToDto​(Rating rating)
      Converts a given rating to a ratingDTO object to limit the data that gets sent to the client
      Parameters:
      rating - the rating that should be converted
      Returns:
      the corresponding dtoObject
